content: a cute heart design cardigan in baby sizes 0-24 months it s a quick and simple pattern with a new stitch to make the hearts you will need aran/worsted acrylic though dk works well for the heart colour 5 5mm/i hook scissors and needle for finishing concentration level a simpler garment pattern for confident beginners and upwards the shaping is basic and there are few decreasing row between 101yds/94g and 204 yds/158g needed depending on size
